Why Baby?
This project was created for Ludum Dare 46 with the theme "Keep it Alive"
Find the code at GitHub

Keyboard:

Interact: E or Space Move: WASD or Arrow Keys Pause: Escape

Controller:

Interact: Bottom Face Move: Left Stick or D-Pad Pause: Start/Menu
